title: Reverse a String
instructions: Write a function to reverse a given string.

title: Factorial
instructions: Write a function to calculate the factorial of a positive integer.

title: Sum of Even Numbers
instructions: Write a function to find the sum of all even numbers from 1 to a given positive integer.

title: Palindrome Check
instructions: Write a function to check if a given string is a palindrome.

title: Fibonacci Sequence
instructions: Write a function to generate the first n numbers of the Fibonacci sequence.
